subject: Football
Concussions
College Athletics
Sports Medicine
Memory
lead_paragraph: Scot Brantley, a star linebacker when a similar knee to the head in 1979 ended his Florida career, is now 51 and has severe short-term memory loss.
snippet: Scot Brantley, a star linebacker when a similar knee to the head in 1979 ended his Florida career, is now 51 and has severe short-term memory loss.
